hero-description: Just Education Matters CIC is a newly established company set up to tackle inequalities in education, particularly in the area of school exclusions.
about_us_description: We support parents to support their children by providing training, advice, advocacy, and support using a proactive approach to improve the educational outcomes for children.
vision_description: We want to see an end to inequality in educational outcomes. We aim to achieve this by changing the education landscape through reducing the incidents of exclusions for groups disproportionately excluded from education and reversing the trend of over-representation for these groups.

article_summary: Statutory guidance for those with legal responsibilities in relation to exclusion. This document from the Department for Education provides a guide to the legislation that governs the exclusion of pupils from maintained schools, pupil referral units (PRUs), academy schools (including free schools, studio schools and university technology colleges) and alternative provision academies (including alternative provision free schools) in England. The Department for Education, September 2017

service_advice_description: At JEM CIC we offer a face-to-face advice service to support parents and our communities navigate the education landscape.
services_page_description: JEM CIC offers a range of services to support parents and our communities navigate the education landscape. Find out more below.

services.heading: What We Offer
services.description: JEM CIC (JEM) offers a range of services to support parents and our communities navigate the education landscape. This is in addition to the general information you will find on the website. We offer both general and bespoke services. Find out more below about how we deliver our services.

advice.title: Advice
advice.description: We offer telephone and face-to-face advice on issues to do with exclusions and related matters.
advice.extraText: Our experienced advisors help navigate complex educational challenges with personalized guidance tailored to your needs.

advocacy.title: Advocacy
advocacy.description: We advocate for parents in two ways depending on what you want.
advocacy.extraText: This can include mediating with schools and assisting in understanding educational policies and procedures.

forums.title: Parent Forums
forums.description: We regularly run forums for parents and community groups on topics they want to explore.
forums.extraText: Our forums create a platform for knowledge-sharing, peer support, and collaborative problem-solving.
